traits.name: Reactive
entries: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
